abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column says proposal is being considered that would allow La Guardia Airport to add domestic long-haul and coast-to-coast flights, making it more attractive to business travelers; points out regional flights could be cut, however.
lead_paragraph: A proposal to end the airport’s 1,500-mile limit on flights could make it more appealing to long-haul travelers who find it convenient to Manhattan, but regional flights could be cut.

headline.main: Longer Flights From La Guardia Might Be Mixed Blessing for Passengers
headline.print_headline: Longer La Guardia Flights Might Be Mixed Blessing

snippet: A proposal to end the airport’s 1,500-mile limit on flights could make it more appealing to long-haul travelers who find it convenient to Manhattan, but regional flights could be cut.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
